About.title: Modern Urology and Men's Health
About.bio: I am Sultonbek Norkuziev, a highly qualified urologist-andrologist. Throughout my career, I have been helping thousands of patients restore their health. My goal is to improve people's quality of life by applying achievements of modern medicine in practice.

educationList.2: Member of European Association of Urology
educationList.3: Advanced training in clinics of Russia and Turkey
